pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Slizzy [![BSD license](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-BSD-blue.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause) [![PyPI version shields.io](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/slizzy.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/slizzy/)Slizzy is a program and a library to search for tracks and download slider.kz, mp3co.biz and zippyshare.com objects.
